assessment-question.definition: To what extent do the Member States in the region define similar targets?

answers.option: All targets defined are the same/similar in most MS (76-100%) in the region
All targets defined are the same/similar in many MS (51-75%) in the region
All targets defined are the same/similar in some MS (26-50%) in the region
All targets defined are the same/similar a few MS (1-25%) in the region
Some targets defined are the same/similar in most MS (76-100%) in the region
Some targets defined are the same/similar in many MS (51-75%) in the region
Some targets defined are the same/similar in some / few MS (1-50%) in the region
All targets are different in all MS in the region
